opinion.case_name: Ortiz Velez, Mayor of Sabana Grande, Puerto Rico v. Rivera-Torres

opinion:
543 U.S. 805

ORTIZ VELEZ, MAYOR OF SABANA GRANDE, PUERTO RICO, ET AL.
v.
RIVERA-TORRES ET AL.,

No. 03-898.

Supreme Court of United States.

October 4, 2004.

1

541 U.S. 972. Motion of respondents for attorney's fees denied without prejudice to filing in the United States Court of Appeals for the First Circuit.
